input: text: The mountains stood towering above the village. Snow capped their peaks year-round. They were a majestic sight to behold.

validityText:
The input specification requires that the paragraph must contain at least three sentences. Upon reviewing the given input, I can identify the following sentences:

1. "The mountains stood towering above the village."
2. "Snow capped their peaks year-round."
3. "They were a majestic sight to behold."

Thus, there are three sentences present in the input, which satisfies the requirement of having at least three sentences.

There is no requirement in the specification regarding the mandatory use of <strong> or <em> tags. Therefore, the absence of these tags in the input does not violate any rules.

The content of the input appears to be suitable for formatting as HTML, as it consists of a paragraph of text that could be converted accordingly, meeting the main criteria.

Conclusively, the input adheres to all listed conditions of the input specification.

OK
